TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NotifyIcon extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public NotInheritable Class NotifyIcon Inherits Component
public ref class NotifyIcon sealed : System::ComponentModel::Component

summary.span: 指定可在通知区域创建图标的组件。

span.span: Specifies a component that creates an icon in the notification area.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通知区域中的图标是快捷方式，在一台计算机，例如病毒防护程序或卷控件的背景中运行的进程。Icons in the notification area are shortcuts to processes that are running in the background of a computer, such as a virus protection program or a volume control. 这些进程不会使用其自己的用户界面。These processes do not come with their own user interfaces. 类以此功能提供程序的方法。The class provides a way to program in this functionality. 属性定义将出现在通知区域图标。The property defines the icon that appears in the notification area. 弹出菜单的图标都与属性。Pop-up menus for an icon are addressed with the property. 属性指定工具提示文本。The property assigns ToolTip text. 为了使图标以显示在通知区域中，属性必须设置为`true`。In order for the icon to show up in the notification area, the property must be set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来显示在通知区域中的应用程序的图标。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ，和属性以及如何处理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. A与**退出**在其上的项分配给属性，它允许用户关闭应用程序。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 当事件发生时，通过调用激活应用程序窗体方法。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: to create the component.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当新创建后，属性设置为`false`。When a new is created, the property is set to `false`. 必须设置属性`true`才能使用你创建。You must set the property to `true` in order to use the you created. 此实例将存在，直到其容器将它释放到垃圾回收。This instance will exist until its container releases it to garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当新创建后，属性设置为`false`。When a new is created, the property is set to `false`. 必须设置属性`true`才能使用你创建。You must set the property to `true` in order to use the you created. 此实例将存在，直到其容器将它释放到垃圾回收。This instance will exist until its container releases it to garbage collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来显示在通知区域中的应用程序的图标。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ，和属性以及如何处理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. A与**退出**在其上的项分配给属性，它允许用户关闭应用程序。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 当事件发生时，通过调用激活应用程序窗体方法。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event BalloonTipClicked As EventHandler

summary.span: 单击气球提示时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the balloon tip is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`NotifyIcon1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `NotifyIcon1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#505](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#505)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#505](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#505)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ContextMenu ^ ContextMenu { System::Windows::Forms::ContextMenu ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ContextMenu ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图标的快捷菜单。

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the icon.
The for the icon.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户右键单击任务栏的通知区域中的图标，将显示菜单。The menu is shown when the user right-clicks an icon in the notification area of the taskbar. 快捷菜单也被称为弹出菜单。Shortcut menus also are known as pop-up menus. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来显示在通知区域中的应用程序的图标。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ，和属性以及如何处理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. A与**退出**在其上的项分配给属性，它允许用户关闭应用程序。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 当事件发生时，通过调用激活应用程序窗体方法。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当用户按下鼠标按钮而指针悬停在任务栏通知区域的图标上时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user presses the mouse button while the pointer is over the icon in the notification area of the taskbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`NotifyIcon1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `NotifyIcon1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#512](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#512)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#512](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#512)]

summary.span: 当用户移动鼠标而指针悬停在任务栏通知区域的图标上时发生。

summary.span: 当用户松开鼠标按钮而指针悬停在任务栏通知区域的图标上时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user releases the mouse button while the pointer is over the icon in the notification area of the taskbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`NotifyIcon1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `NotifyIcon1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 在任务栏中显示气球提示。

span.span: Displays the balloon tip in the taskbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ShowBalloonTip(int32 timeout) cil managed

param.name: timeout
param.span: 气球状提示应显示的时间段，以毫秒为单位。

span.span: The time period, in milliseconds, the balloon tip should display.

para.span: 从 Windows Vista 开始，否决此参数。

span.span: This parameter is deprecated as of Windows Vista.

para.span: 现在通知显示时间是基于系统辅助功能设置。

span.span: Notification display times are now based on system accessibility settings.

summary.span: 指定时间段内在任务栏中显示气球状提示。

span.span: Displays a balloon tip in the taskbar for the specified time period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最小和最大超时值由操作系统强制执行，并且通常是 10 到 30 秒，分别，但是这具体取决于操作系统而异。Minimum and maximum timeout values are enforced by the operating system and are typically 10 and 30 seconds, respectively, however this can vary depending on the operating system. 太大或太小的超时值调整为适当的最小值或最大值。Timeout values that are too large or too small are adjusted to the appropriate minimum or maximum value. 此外，如果用户未显示要使用 （没有键盘或鼠标事件的发生） 的计算机则系统不计算此时间在超时值。In addition, if the user does not appear to be using the computer (no keyboard or mouse events are occurring) then the system does not count this time towards the timeout. 只有一个气球状提示可以在任务栏上显示一次。Only one balloon tip can display on the taskbar at a time. 尝试在一个当前显示在任务栏原因时显示的气球状提示`timeout`值被忽略。Attempting to display a balloon tip when one is currently displayed on the taskbar causes the `timeout` value to be ignored. 行为会略有不同，具体取决于操作系统和气球状提示是否从另一个，或同一应用程序。The behavior is slightly different depending on the operating system and whether the balloon tip is from another, or the same, application. 第二个显示，而不考虑的值之前从其他应用程序的第二个的气球状提示时，第一个气球状提示将显示的最小超时值`timeout`。When the second balloon tip is from another application, the first balloon tip will display for the minimum timeout value before the second appears, regardless of the value of `timeout`. 在大多数情况下，如果气球提示来自同一个应用程序，第一个的气球状提示立即关闭时再次调用方法由。In most cases, if the balloon tips are from the same application, the first balloon tip immediately closes when another call to the method is made. 在某些情况下第二个气球状将在第一次气球之上打开。In some cases the second balloon will open on top of the first balloon. 标题文本将显示在顶部附近的气球状加粗字体。The title text will display in a bold font near the top of the balloon. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例，请将此代码示例粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含名为`notifyIcon1`。To run this example, paste the example code into a Windows Form that contains a named `notifyIcon1`. 调用`SetBalloonTip`从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。Call `SetBalloonTip` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

span.span: is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ShowBalloonTip (int timeout, string tipTitle, string tipText, System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon tipIcon);
.method public hidebysig instance void ShowBalloonTip(int32 timeout, string tipTitle, string tipText, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon tipIcon) cil managed
Public Sub ShowBalloonTip (timeout As Integer, tipTitle As String, tipText As String, tipIcon As ToolTipIcon)
public: void ShowBalloonTip(int timeout, System::String ^ tipTitle, System::String ^ tipText, System::Windows::Forms::ToolTipIcon tipIcon);

param.name: timeout
param.span: 气球状提示应显示的时间段，以毫秒为单位。

span.span: The time period, in milliseconds, the balloon tip should display.

para.span: 从 Windows Vista 开始，否决此参数。

span.span: This parameter is deprecated as of Windows Vista.

para.span: 现在通知显示时间是基于系统辅助功能设置。

span.span: Notification display times are now based on system accessibility settings.

param.name: tipTitle
param.span: 要在气球状提示上显示的标题。

span.span: The title to display on the balloon tip.

param.name: tipText
param.span: 要在气球状提示上显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display on the balloon tip.
One of the values.

summary.span: 在指定时间段内，在任务栏中显示具有指定标题、文本和图标的气球状提示。

span.span: Displays a balloon tip with the specified title, text, and icon in the taskbar for the specified time period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最小和最大超时值由操作系统强制执行，并且通常是 10 到 30 秒，分别，但是这具体取决于操作系统而异。Minimum and maximum timeout values are enforced by the operating system and are typically 10 and 30 seconds, respectively, however this can vary depending on the operating system. 太大或太小的超时值调整为适当的最小值或最大值。Timeout values that are too large or too small are adjusted to the appropriate minimum or maximum value. 此外，如果用户未显示要使用 （没有键盘或鼠标事件的发生） 的计算机则系统不计算此时间在超时值。In addition, if the user does not appear to be using the computer (no keyboard or mouse events are occurring) then the system does not count this time towards the timeout. 只有一个气球状提示可以在任务栏上显示一次。Only one balloon tip can display on the taskbar at a time. 尝试在一个当前显示在任务栏原因时显示的气球状提示`timeout`值被忽略。Attempting to display a balloon tip when one is currently displayed on the taskbar causes the `timeout` value to be ignored. 行为会略有不同，具体取决于操作系统和气球状提示是否从另一个，或同一应用程序。The behavior is slightly different depending on the operating system and whether the balloon tip is from another, or the same, application. 第二个显示，而不考虑的值之前从其他应用程序的第二个的气球状提示时，第一个气球状提示将显示的最小超时值`timeout`。When the second balloon tip is from another application, the first balloon tip will display for the minimum timeout value before the second appears, regardless of the value of `timeout`. 在大多数情况下，如果气球提示来自同一个应用程序，第一个的气球状提示立即关闭时再次调用方法由。In most cases, if the balloon tips are from the same application, the first balloon tip immediately closes when another call to the method is made. 在某些情况下第二个气球状将在第一次气球之上打开。In some cases the second balloon will open on top of the first balloon. 标题文本将显示在顶部附近的气球状加粗字体。The title text will display in a bold font near the top of the balloon. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例，请将此代码示例粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含名为`notifyIcon1`。To run this example, paste the example code into a Windows Form that contains a named `notifyIcon1`. 将关联`Form1_DoubleClick`方法在此示例中处理该窗体事件。Associate the `Form1_DoubleClick` method in this example with the form's event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

The that contains data about the .

summary.span: 获取或设置当鼠标指针停留在通知区域图标上时显示的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer rests on a notification area icon.

value.span: 当鼠标指针停留在通知区域图标上时显示的工具提示文本。

span.span: The ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer rests on a notification area icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文本是`null`，没有工具提示显示。If the text is `null`, no ToolTip is displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来显示在通知区域中的应用程序的图标。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ，和属性以及如何处理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. A与**退出**在其上的项分配给属性，它允许用户关闭应用程序。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 当事件发生时，通过调用激活应用程序窗体方法。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 工具提示文本长度超过 63 个字符。

span.span: ToolTip text is more than 63 characters long.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Visible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示任务栏的通知区域是否会显示图标。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the icon is visible in the notification area of the taskbar.

value.span: 如果图标在通知区域中可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the icon is visible in the notification area; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于默认值是`false`，才会显示在通知区域图标，你必须设置属性`true`。Since the default value is `false`, in order for the icon to show up in the notification area, you must set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来显示在通知区域中的应用程序的图标。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ，和属性以及如何处理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. A与**退出**在其上的项分配给属性，它允许用户关闭应用程序。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 当事件发生时，通过调用激活应用程序窗体方法。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/VB/source.vb#1)]
